name: Caretaker of the Trees
description:
You are the Caretaker of the Palm Trees. When night falls, it is your duty to protect the defenseless saplings. Relocate saplings and build walls around them in the morning. Then fend off the evil bugs with your magic at night. Instructions:
  • Left Click to build or repair walls in Range.
  • Right Click to pick up chickens, or attack evil spirits.
  • Don't lose all of your saplings!

This game is a submission to Game Jam Plus Manila 2022. Made by the team Blue Baron Games.

Contributions:
  • Artist: Briauna H / @FermentedCitrus
  • Sound Design: Gabe T / @CrumbleThorn
  • Programming: Prinz G / @NoonTimeDreamer
Programs Used:
  • Clip Studio Paint
  • FL Studio
  • Godot 3.5
